data.title: Mountain View Police Department Calls for Service: 1/5/23
data.text:
2022-02268 109 Assist Motorist 12/16/2022

Unfounded

Responded to a call of a white trail blazer that was broke down in the middle of the intersection on hwy 60 by Signal. Upon arrival, no vehicle was found.

2022-02269 134 Follow up Investigation 12/16/2022

Report Taken

Was dispatched to review some footage of possible child abuse that was seen inside Walmart. Report was taken.

2022-02270 134 Follow up Investigation 12/16/2022 Report Taken

Following up on an incident from earlier. Division of family services were contacted. Conducted a book and release of one female.

2022-02271 134 Information 12/16/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female called the police department to provide further information on a suspected child abuse report she filed.

2022-02272 134 Information 12/16/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female came into the police department to receive her citations from an earlier incident.

2022-02273 134 Information 12/16/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female called requesting medical records for children that were taken into state custody. The caller was advised to contact DFS or the hospital for the records.

2022-02274 134 Information 12/16/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female came back to the police department with more information regarding a child abuse report she previously reported.

2022-02275 104 Check the Wellbeing 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Received a call from Casey’s General Store about a male that had walked in and did not know where he was or who he was. He had a key to a motel so the RP had gave him a ride to the motel. Contact was made with the subject and EMS was contacted. Male refused medical treatment.

2022-02276 104 Traffic Stop 12/17/2022

Summons

Citation issued for speeding.

2022-02277 104 Misc Offence 12/17/2022

Gone on Arrival

Received a call about vandalism at the Rp’s neighbor’s house. RP had video evidence of the incident. Rp was advised to send the video to the police department for review.

2022-002278 104 Traffic Stop 12/17/2022

Summons

Citations issued for speeding and failure to show proof of insurance.

2022-02279 134 Information 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female requesting information regarding an incident that occurred on 12/16/2022. Information was provided.

2022-02280 134 Information 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female with questions and information regarding an ongoing issue with a juvenile. Information was provided.

2022-02281 134 MIsc Offence 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to W. 1st St. for a possible stolen vehicle report. The RP stated his girlfriend took his vehicle without permission. The vehicle was located a short time later nearby and was returned to the owner. The RP did not wish to file charges.

2022-02282 134 Assist other Agency 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by children’s division requesting law enforcement to accompany them on two home visits. The visits were conducted without incident.

2022-02283 134 Auto ACCIDENT/ J1 12/17/2022

Report Taken

Was dispatched to E. US Hwy 60 for a 2 vehicle crash. Contact was made with both drivers, information was collected for an accident report. No observable injuries were present.

2022-0284 134 Custody Exchange 12/17/2022

Disregarded

Was contacted by a male stating he was at the police department wanting to speak with an officer about child custody. Upon arrival the caller was not at the police department and call backs to the RP were not answered.

2022-02285 134 Information 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female involved in an incident on 12/16/2022 and was requesting further information. Information was provided.

2022-02286 104 Misc Offence 12/17/2022

No Report Needed

Received a call about cows in the roadway. After searching the area, no cows were located.

2022-02287 128 Peace Disturbance 12/17/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched for a noise complaint.

2022-02288 128 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

911 gave a call back number. There was no name. They stated that the caller was getting prank calls by unknown numbers.

2022-02290 134 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female requesting information from a crash report. Information was provided.

2022-2291 134 Harassment 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a male stating that multiple sets of keys were being dropped at multiple locations with his wife’s name on them. The male was concerned and stated he would bring the keys and file a report.

2022-02292 134 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female came into the police department to report that someone is dropping keys with her name on them and she is not the owner or affiliated with the keys.

2022-02293 134 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

A male came into the police department with concerns about someone leaving keys at a business with his name on the keys but the keys did not belong to him.

2022-02294 134 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

A female contacted the police department requesting video from an earlier incident. The caller was advised the video was unavailable.

2022-02295 134 Misc Hazard 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to Walmart parking lot for a pickup parked in the roadway blocking traffic. The area was checked but the vehicle had already left and traffic was open.

2022-02296 103 Ped Check 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

An elderly male was having chest pains and called for EMS. Arrived at the scene and made contact with the male. The information that was gathered was relayed to EMS once they arrived on scene.

2022-02297 103 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Paper service. Served a subpoena.

2022-02298 103 Information 12/18/2022

Report Taken

Female came to the station to file report for an ex breaking her phone, taking her mail and her children’s social security cards along with birth certificates. The male also refused to allow the female to leave her home whilst dropping off the children. Female was advised to file for an order of protection.

2022-02299 103 Information 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Subpoena was served.

2022-02300 103 Follow up Investigation 12/18/2022

Unfounded

Doing knock and talks around the apartments seeking information on a domestic that had happened earlier in the day. No one had heard or seen anything.

2022-02301 103 Check the Wellbeing 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to Signal to speak with an employee who was advising of a female needing assistance. Female refused to speak with anyone when asked if she needed assistance.

2022-02302 128 Assist Other Agency 12/18/2022

Assistance Rendered

Assisted MSHP with a bond on a warrant.

2022-02303 128 Check the Wellbeing 12/19/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched for a wellbeing check for a female possibly having a seizure. The female was ok and not having a seizure.

2022-02304 103 Information 12/19/2022

Assistance Rendered

Male came into the police department to pick up his copy of a subpoena.

2022-02305 103 Suspicious Circumstances 12/19/2022

Assistance Rendered

Female called stating that there were children hiding in the bushes at the old Duncan funeral home and were throwing logs into the road trying to hit cars. Spoke with the children and they stated the log was already in the roadway and they were trying to move it. I made contact with the children’s parents and advised them of the situation.

2022-02307 103 Warrant Arrest/ Outside Jurisdiction 12/20/2022

Report Taken

Arrested a male on a warrant for probation and parole violation. HE was transported to the Howell County Jail.

2022-02308 109 Auto Accident/ J1 12/20/2022

Report Taken

Was dispatched to a 2 vehicle accident. Both vehicles were towed. Information was gathered for report.

2022-02309 109 Area Check 12/20/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to check the roadway for a male with an altered mental status driving. Made contact with the male and it was determined he was fine to drive and had a valid license.

2022-02310 103 Check the Wellbeing 12/20/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to check on a juvenile who was home alone and there were 2 unknown vehicles parked outside. Made contact with the vehicles and they were cleared to be there. Spoke with the juvenile and juvenile’s mother.

2022-02311 103 Information 12/20/2022

Assistance Rendered

Subpoena served.

2022-02312 103 Follow up Investigation 12/20/2022

Assistance Rendered

RP stated they had purchased a phone but when trying to activate it, the cell phone company stated it was stolen. Made contact with cell phone company and they advised the phone was not stolen. Phone was released to RP.

2022-02313 128 Trespass 12/20/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to Walmart for some customers that were being unruly. Walmart wanted the customers trespassed.

2022-02316 125 Assist Motorist 12/21/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to assist subject at Dollar General. Assistance was rendered.

2022-02317 124 Peace Disturbance 12/21/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched for a report of people yelling and screaming in the roadway. Spoke with one of the individuals involved. They advised the other party had left and they would keep the noise down.

2022-02318 124 Civil Matter 12/21/2022

Assistance Rendered

Called citizen back that was asking for advice on a child custody issue.

2022-02319 124 Suspicious Circumstances 12/21/2022

No Report Needed

Took a request for extra patrol in an area due to strange noises they had been hearing.

2022-02320 124 Suspicious Circumstances 12/21/2022

Assistance Rendered

Went to Signal to check on some minors that the clerk thought were drinking alcohol. The minors blew into a PBT and none of them had been drinking. Signal wanted them to leave the property.

2022-02321 124 Suspicious Subject 12/21/2022

Assistance Rendered

Stopped to check on several people running up the road. They advised they had been looking for a subject who had ran away from a nearby nursing home. They explained the person had been found and they were fine.

2022-02322 124 Juvenile Problem 12/21/2022

Responded to location for report of an out of control juvenile. Was able to speak with juvenile and they agreed to go with EMS to get help at a mental hospital.

2022-02324 103 Check the Wellbeing 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to the softball field for a wellbeing check on a man sitting on the side of the road. Contact was made and the male was ok.

2022-02325 125 Area Check 12/22/2022

No Report Needed

Dispatched to a black truck in the ditch. Unknown injuries. Arrived on scene to find that MSHP was already on scene and had the situation under control.

2022-02327 124 Building Check 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Responded for report of the resident’s back door having been kicked in. Home owner was not in the area and requested it checked. Arrived to find the door had been kicked in and the prints in the snow looked like someone had went inside. House was cleared and no one was located. Nothing appeared destroyed or out of place other than the door. Home owner was contacted and advised of the situation and what was found. They said they would try to get the residence and secure it.

2022-02328 124 Suspicious Subject 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Responded for a suspicious subject who seemed to be trying car doors in the parking lot. Contact was made with the subject and he advised he had been in the parking lot because he had seen his girlfriend’s car, but he had not been trying any doors. No evidence was found as to if he was being truthful or not, call was cleared and returned to service.

2022-02329 124 Alarm/ Commercial 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Checked a business and found it secure. Nothing appeared disturbed or out of place from the outside.

2022-02330 124 Check the Wellbeing 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Checked on elderly female who was having some mental issues due to effects of her medication. Female advised she had slept for a while and was doing better since the medication had started wearing off.

2022-02335 134 Information 12/22/2022

Assistance Rendered

Stopped and checked on some individuals out in front of the restaurant messing with the door. The subjects were the owners who were checking to make sure the pipes weren’t freezing. Call was cleared and returned to service.

2022-02332 124 Assist other Agency 12/23/2022

Assistance Rendered

Assisted Mercy hospital by giving patient a ride home inside of city limits.

2022-02333 134 Information 12/23/2022

Disregarded

Was contacted by a male requesting to speak with an officer. The male did not like the officer who contacted him and refused to speak about the matter that he had originally called for.

2022-02334 134 Check the Wellbeing 12/23/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to E. 7th St. to check on an elderly female who had been sick and advised her house did not have heat. Contact was made and the female did have heat in her home and refused medical treatment, stating that it was just too cold.

2022-02335 134 Information 12/23/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by property manager regarding the wellbeing check that had been done on a unit. Some information was provided.

2022-02336 134 Information 12/23/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a male with questions how to get water since his well pipes were frozen. Information was provided.

2022-02337 134 Information 12/23/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a male asking why officers had come to his residence. Information was provided.

2022-02338 104 Misc Offence 12/23/2022

No Report Needed

Received a call about a dog being outside on a leash and barking. Spoke with animal owner who said she had just let the dog out to use the bathroom.

2022-02339 134 Information 12/24/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female with questions regarding child custody.

2022-02340 134 Information 12/24/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female requesting information about a crash report. Information was provided.

2022-02343 128 Alarm/ Commercial 12/24/2022

No Report Needed

Dispatched for an alarm call. Upon arrival, discovered a package was slid under the door.

2022-02349 128 Alarm/ Commercial 12/26/2022

Assistance Rendered

Dispatched to the license office for an alarm going off. Building was checked and secured.

2022-02350 128 Check the Wellbeing 12/27/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to the senior housing to check on a male. Made contact with the male and he was ok.

2022-02352 103 Check the Wellbeing 12/27/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to check on an elderly male who was confused about where he was. The male was taken by ambulance to the hospital to determine what was wrong.

2022-02354 103 Assist other Agency 12/27/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was asked to confirm a warrant for West Plains PD. Warrant was confirmed.

2022-02357 103 Check the Wellbeing 12/28/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to Hazel St. for an elderly male who was refusing to eat anything and may be combative. Male was transported by EMS.

2022-02362 125 12/29/2022 Assist Motorist

Assistance Rendered

Vehicle stalled out in the intersection of Hwy 60 and Hwy Y. Arrived on scene and assisted the motorist in moving the vehicle out of the roadway.

2022-02363 128 Area Check 12/29/2022

Unfounded

Was dispatched to Simmons Bank to check for a suspicious subject in dark clothing. Upon arrival no one was there. The area was checked.

2022-02364 128 Check the Wellbeing 12/29/2022

Assistance Rendered

Dispatched to check on an elderly male. Male refused medical treatment.

2022-02366 104 Domestic/ In Progress 12/31/2022

Summons

Was dispatched to Second St. for a domestic in progress. Made contact with the parties involved. Both stated it was a misunderstanding. Both parties admitted to breaking the window in the building. Citations issued for property damage.

2022-02370 128 Check the Wellbeing 12/31/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to check on a male. Made contact and male was ok.

2022-02371 128 Traffic Stop 12/31/2022

Summons

Citation issued for speeding.

2022-02372 128 Check the Wellbeing 12/31/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was dispatched to check on room at the motel. Spoke with RP who advised they believed the people in the room had been smoking. RP was advised they would have to kick them out for smoking.

2022-02373 128 Assist Other Agency 12/31/2022

Assistance Rendered

Dispatched to assist EMS. Upon arrival, emergency services was not needed.

2022-02374 128 Information 12/31/2022

Assistance Rendered

Received a name and number about a male wanting rid of medications. Information was provided as to where they can be disposed.

2022-02375 128 Contact Message 12/31/2022

Assistance Rendered

Was provided a name and number for setting up a child exchange later on.

2023-00003 103 Civil Matter 01/01/2023

Assistance Rendered

A neighbor on N. Harrison St. said that a dog had gotten into his neighbors trash. Arrived on scene and spoke with the neighbors who stated it was their dog and their trash. They were already cleaning it up. Spoke to the RP and left him know what had happened.

2023-00005 103 Assist Other Agency 01/01/2023

Assistance Rendered

Warrants were confirmed and sent to HCSO.

2023-00006 134 Information 01/02/2023

Assistance Rendered

Was contacted by a female with questions regarding where to go in case of tornados. Information was provided.

2023-00007 103 Burglary/ Not in Progress 01/02/2023

Report Taken

Was dispatched to N. Marr St. and spoke with RP who had a video of a suspect trying to break into his church. Complaint form was given to the RP to fill out. Form was given back and charges will be filed.

2023-00009 103 Follow Up Investigation 01/02/2023

Unfounded

Made contact with the manager of motel because information was given that may lead to suspect on burglary from earlier. Manager confirmed the suspect was not there.
